short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplifies the formatting of comments and posts. Provides a preview.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Writing comments or posts will be easy with the Duolingo Text Editor. You no longer need to memorize a bunch of rules for formatting code.

The main features of the editor:
- Bold
- Italic
- Strikethrough
- Headers:
    - Heading 2
    - Heading 3
    - Heading 4
    - Heading 5
    - Heading 6
- Highlighted text
- Quote
- New line (100%)
- Insert horizontal line
- Create a link
- Insert an image
- Undo
- Redo
- Preview!
